headline: Equinix (EQIX) Exceeds Market Returns: Some Facts to Consider
summary: Equinix (EQIX) closed the most recent trading day at $806.35, moving +1.91% from the previous trading session.

headline: Europe Data Center Colocation Outlook Report 2025-2030: Market to Witness Investments of $144+ Billion
summary: The Europe Data Center Colocation Market is set to expand significantly, valued at USD 9.45 billion in 2024, with projections reaching USD 35.73 billion by 2030, a CAGR of 24.82%. Western Europe dominates with a 70.48% investment share. The rise in AI and 5G deployments is fueling the need for AI-ready and edge data centers, respectively.
